title: ICE: `coercion error but no error emitted` / `mismatched types` / `broken MIR`

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust #![crate_type = "lib"] pub trait TestTrait { type MyType; fn func() -> Option where Self: Sized; } impl dyn TestTrait where Self: Sized, { fn other_func() -> TestTrait { match Self::func() { None => None, } } } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.72.0-nightly (d59363ad0 2023-06-01) binary: rustc commit-hash: d59363ad0b6391b7fc5bbb02c9ccf9300eef3753 commit-date: 2023-06-01 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.72.0-nightly LLVM version: 16.0.4 ``` ### Error output ``` warning: trait objects without an explicit `dyn` are deprecated --> treereduce.out:13:24 | 13 | fn other_func() -> TestTrait { | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ | = warning: this is accepted in the current edition (Rust 2015) but is a hard error in Rust 2021! = note: for more information, see = note: `#[warn(bare_trait_objects)]` on by default help: use `dyn` | 13 | fn other_func() -> dyn TestTrait { | +++ warning: associated function `other_func` is never used --> treereduce.out:13:8 | 9 | impl dyn TestTrait | --------------------------------- associated function in this implementation ... 13 | fn other_func() -> TestTrait { | ^^^^^^^^^^ | = note: `#[warn(dead_code)]` on by default ```
Backtrace

``` error: internal compiler error: no errors encountered even though `delay_span_bug` issued error: internal compiler error: coercion error but no error emitted --> treereduce.out:15:21 | 15 | None => None, | ^^^^ | = note: delayed at compiler/rustc_hir_typeck/src/coercion.rs:1554:34 0: ::emit_diagnostic 1: ::delay_span_bug:: 2: ::check_match::{closure#0} 3: ::check_expr_with_expectation_and_args 4: ::check_block_with_expected 5: ::check_expr_with_expectation_and_args 6: ::check_return_expr 7: rustc_hir_typeck::check::check_fn 8: rustc_hir_typeck::typeck 9: rustc_query_impl::plumbing::__rust_begin_short_backtrace::> 10: >::call_once 11: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query::>, false, false, false>,
